  5. from django.db import models

  8. from ftp_deploy.utils.core import service_check
  9. from .notification import Notification
  12. class Service(models.Model):
  14. ftp_host = models.CharField('Host', max_length=255)
  15. ftp_username = models.CharField('Username', max_length=50)
  16. ftp_password = models.CharField('Password', max_length=50)
  17. ftp_path = models.CharField('Path', max_length=255)
  19. repo_source = models.CharField('Source', max_length=10, choices=(('bb', 'BitBucket'),))
  20. repo_name = models.CharField('Respository Name', max_length=50)
  21. repo_slug_name = models.SlugField('Respository Slug', max_length=50)
  22. repo_branch = models.CharField('Branch', max_length=50)
  23. repo_hook = models.BooleanField(default=False)
  25. secret_key = models.CharField('Secret Key', unique=True, max_length=30, default=lambda: ''.join(random.choice(string.letters + string.digits) for x in range(30)))
  27. status = models.BooleanField()
  28. status_message = models.TextField()
  29. notification = models.ForeignKey(Notification, null=True, blank=True, on_delete=models.SET_NULL)
  30. lock = models.BooleanField(default=False)
  31. created = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
  32. updated = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
  34. def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
  35. self.check = True
  36. return super(Service, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
  38. def __unicode__(self):
  39. return self.repo_name
  41. def deploys(self):
  42. return self.log_set.filter(status=True).count()
  44. def fail_deploys(self):
  45. return self.log_set.filter(status=False).filter(skip=False).count()
  47. def skipped_deploys(self):
  48. return self.log_set.filter(status=False).filter(skip=True).count()
  50. def latest_log_date(self):
  51. return self.log_set.latest('created').created
  53. def latest_log_user(self):
  54. return self.log_set.latest('created').user
  56. def hook_url(self):
  57. return reverse('ftpdeploy_deploy', kwargs={'secret_key': self.secret_key})
  59. def save(self, **kwargs):
  60. """Check service status on save"""
  62. if self.check:
  63. message = list()
  64. fails, message = service_check(self).check_all()
  66. if fails[2]:
  67. self.repo_hook = False
  68. else:
  69. self.repo_hook = True
  71. if True in fails:
  72. self.status_message = '<br>'.join(message)
  73. self.status = False
  74. else:
  75. self.status = True
  76. self.status_message = ''
  78. super(Service, self).save()
